Judul: 2018 in news: The science events that shaped the year Wildfires, cosmic rays and ancient-human hybrids are some of this year���s top stories.
Abstrak:
A turbulent year marked by raging wildfires and allegations of bullying 
in the sciences comes to a close. But researchers can celebrate some  milestones, including the most 
accurate map yet of the Milky Way’s  stars, and the discovery of bones  showing that a woman who lived 
90,000 years ago had a Neanderthal mother and a Denisovan dad.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: CASTELVECCHI: ELSE: GIBNEY: LEDFORD: LEE: MORELLO: TOLLEFSON: WITZE
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
